data.content: Just go somewhere else for your tooth needs.
He had to split this tooth in half and it broke off like the last tooth but this time I didn't feel any pain at all
I had chipped my front tooth, the students took great care of me, and my tooth is as good as new!!
They numbed the area around the tooth with local anesthesia and took well over an hour hacking at and pulling the pieces of tooth.
I went in for a broken tooth that was hurting, which they told me needed extracted (turns out they were wrong, but that's another story).
Now i have to get the remaining tooth pulled and need an implant that i have no way of affording.
You won't save that much money going here - in fact, I think it's a bit of a rip-off.
I do not have the money or the patience to drag myself over there.
I pay out of pocket for NYU Dental and so far, it's been money well spent.
The staff was courteous and compassionate.
The staff figured out the error and sorted things out.
Apart of a few bad apples, all the staff and the faculty is very friendly.
I only give it 2 stars because the staff was friendly.
